NAME: Government Entities
DESCRIPION: Level of engagement of the local government with supra-local and sub-local government entities, and vice-versa, regarding the decision-making process.

NAME: Private Sector Entities
DESCRIPION: Level of engagement of local government with the private sector, and vice-versa, regarding the decision-making process.

NAME: Civil Society Entities
DESCRIPION: Level of engagement of local government with civil society entities, such as civil society organisations and local leaders, and vice-versa, regarding the decision-making process.

NAME: Other Major Institutions
DESCRIPION: Level of engagement of the local government with other major institutions, and vice-versa, regarding the decision-making process.
